title: (x) West Coast Choppers logo - Ironwood {Chesh}
content:
Hey,   
   
I was also curious if anyone knew the names of the two fonts that are used on the West Coast Choppers iron cross logo. I believe that the one used for 'Choppers' is a variation of IRONWORK, but I'm not for certain. Here's a link to the logo:   
   
 [http://www.marzdistribution.com/images/WCC\_LOGO.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055151/http:/www.marzdistribution.com/images/WCC_LOGO.jpg)   
   
If you happen to know the names &/or where I can obtain the fonts, I'd be very happy. Thanks & have a beautiful day.   
   
Kevo

 [‹ (x) Classic cadillac logo - custom (similar to English 157) {Mark S, Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055151/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5050 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Last Waltz - customized Caslon {Chesh} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055151/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5047 "Go to next forum topic")
author: thereink

comments.content:
Discussed [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055151/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33862.html).   
   
How is it I remember this but not what I did for a client last week?

Dave,   
   
Nice work - you've saved me a ton of searching. I guess I'll be buying my first font - and it's crap! I guess it's just like the Kinks say... you gotta give the people what they want.   
   
Thanks so much.   
   
Kevo
